title: Chapter 1515
body:
Chapter 1515

1515 Killing Shi Tian

Shi Tian’s face turned pale.

“How dare you all …”

...

Shi Tian roared.

“I’ll kill you now!”

Lu Ming stepped forward and charged at Shi Tian.

Shi Tian’s figure retreated madly, his mouth shouting,”Senior brother, save me!”

how dare you kill the disciples of my heavenly God sect! Die!

At this moment, a cold murderous intent rushed out of the canyon. A huge palm print made of holy light came toward Lu Ming.

This palm was extremely terrifying. Lu Ming had a feeling that if he was hit by this palm, he would be killed.

“Leave it to me!”

“I’ll do it!”

Tian Chui and Xue ningxin rushed out at the same time.

Tian Chui raised the giant hammer in his hand, and the muscles all over his body bulged. Like a wild dragon, he smashed the hammer towards the palm print.

Roar!

Xue ningxin let out a Dragon’s Roar as her body emitted a cold aura. Her fists seemed to have turned into ice and snow as she threw out two punches.

Tian Chui and Xue ningxin’s attacks clashed with the palm print at the same time.

BOOM! BOOM!

With two earth-shaking explosions, Tian Chui and Xue ningxin both groaned as their bodies were sent flying.

However, the palm print was also greatly weakened and continued to attack Lu Ming.

Lu Ming’s glabella shone and a shield appeared. It flew forward and blocked the palm print.

At the same time, a long spear was formed in Lu Ming’s hand. He swung the long spear, and like a flash of lightning, it stabbed towards Shi Tian.

This move was astonishingly fast. It directly pierced through Shi Tian’s defense and his dantian, nailing him to the ground.

“I hate …”

Shi Tian roared, full of unwillingness, but in the next moment, there was no breath left.

He had been killed by Lu Ming.

BOOM!

The palm print hit the shield and it was sent flying. It shrank rapidly and flew into Lu Ming’s glabella, disappearing. However, this shield was a holy weapon and it successfully blocked the attack.

“You’re looking for death!”

A shocking aura burst out from the canyon. A roar was heard as the terrifying aura rushed out of the canyon.

not good! Let’s go!!

Lu Ming roared and soared into the sky.

At the same time, Tian Chui and Xue ningxin also rose into the air and flew away.

Buzzzzzz!

A young man rushed out of the canyon, his body exuding a shocking killing intent. He glared at Lu Ming and the other two and roared, ” “After killing the disciples of my heavenly God sect, you still want to escape? Kill!”

The young man turned into a ray of holy light and chased after Lu Ming and the rest at an alarming speed.

“So fast!”

Lu Ming was shocked. The other party’s speed was too fast. He was approaching them at an extreme speed.

Whoosh!

The other party waved his hand and slashed out a ray of holy light. The Holy Light streaked across the void and headed for Lu Ming.

At the last moment, Lu Ming killed Shi Tian. This made the other party target Lu Ming.

Shi Tian was a rare heaven’s favorite in the tianshen sect. In the Emperor Cang’s Secret realm, he had received the inheritance and was heavily nurtured. But now, he was killed by Lu Ming.

“Junior Brother, be careful!”

Tian Chui shouted.

The Holy Light was so fast that it approached Lu Ming in an instant.

Whoosh!

Black wings extended from Lu Ming’s back, protecting his body.

Clang!

The Holy Light struck the black wings, causing them to tremble violently. Lu Ming’s body was sent flying like a cannonball.

“So strong!”

Lu Ming felt his qi and blood surging in his body, and a stream of blood spilled from his mouth.

Even with the black wings to block, he was still blasted to the point of spitting blood. It was clear how strong the other party’s attack was.

Lv 9 martial Royal realm!

Furthermore, he was a top heaven’s favorite with shocking battle prowess.

“Junior Brother, how are you?”

Xue Xin called out in concern.

“I’m fine. We can’t go on like this. They’ll catch up to us sooner or later. Senior brothers and sisters, let go of your bodies and minds. Don’t resist!”

Lu Ming shouted.

“Alright!”

Tian Chui and Xue ningxin subconsciously nodded.

Lu Ming waved his hand and the mountain and river diagram appeared. He kept Tian Chui and Xue ningxin into the mountain and river diagram. Then, he activated the wind element technique. With a flap of his black wings, his figure was like a Black Lightning, rushing forward at an extreme speed. His speed was not slower than the divine sky sect’s paragons behind him.

The heaven’s God sect’s Paragon’s expression changed. The killing intent on his face grew stronger as he glared at Lu Ming. The Holy Light on his body burned like a ball of white flames. He sped up and followed closely behind Lu Ming.

“Who is that?”

“What a shocking fluctuation. That’s the top heaven’s pride expert of the heavenly God sect, Shi Guan.”

who’s the person running ahead? he’s actually being chased by Shi Guan? ”

that person is not ordinary either. That pair of wings is a holy weapon!

The two of them, one chasing and one escaping, also attracted the attention of others.

“Eh? It’s that guy, Lu Ming!”

In front of Lu Ming, there were a few black-robed young men. They heard the commotion and looked over. When one of them saw Lu Ming, his eyes flashed with killing intent.

These people were the disciples of the Tian Yu demon sect. The person who had spoken was mo he.

he’s being chased by the stone crown. Let’s stop that Lu Ming!

Mo he said coldly. He unsheathed his demonic blade and slashed at Lu Ming with a ray of light.

Lu Ming, who was flying at high speed, narrowed his eyes and used his black wings to block in front of him.

Bang!

The demonic blade slashed at the black-feathered wings. Lu Ming’s body trembled as his figure was blocked.

“Lu Ming, let’s see how you die today!”

Mo he’s eyes were cold. He stood in front of Lu Ming, his demonic Qi soaring to the sky.

Back then, he was ordered to kill Lu Ming. In the end, not only did he fail to kill Lu Ming, but the five seventh level martial emperors who followed him all died. Even he himself was tricked by Lu Ming’s formation. He lost an arm and even his storage ring.

During this period of time, he had been thinking about revenge at all times.

He did not expect to meet Lu Ming here. Moreover, Lu Ming was being hunted down by the experts of the heaven deity sect. Of course, he would not hesitate to take action.

“Mo he, I’ll kill you sooner or later!”

Lu Ming said coldly. His figure flashed and he was about to rush to the other side.

“Stay here!”

Mo he shouted coldly. His demonic blade slashed horizontally and instantly slashed out ten blade rays.

Now, mo he’s arm that was cut off by Lu Ming had grown back. His cultivation had reached the peak of the sixth level Martial Emperor realm.

Mo he was a superior-grade earth spiritual body, and his combat strength was extremely shocking.

Lu Ming did not take it head-on. His black wings slashed across like a heavenly blade, breaking mo he’s blade aura and rushing past.

“Stay!”

The two disciples of the Tian Yu demonic sect who were with mo he unsheathed their demonic blades and charged at Lu Ming.

They were two youths at the peak of the fifth level martial monarch realm. Their combat strength was not weak.

At the same time, the stone crown behind him was already approaching.

“Kill!”

die! Lu Ming roared. Two rays of black light flashed in his eyes and he charged at the two disciples of the sky demon sect.

The two of them shuddered. At this moment, Lu Ming waved his hand and the Black Dragon Spear appeared. It turned into two spearlights and stabbed at the two disciples of the sky demon sect.

The spear radiance contained the technique of thirteen accumulated strikes. Ten bursts of power burst out and pierced through the two people’s attacks and defenses.

Pfft! Pfft!

The two disciples of the Tian Yu demonic sect were dead.

Die!

At this moment, Shi Guan arrived. He condensed a spear of divine punishment in his hand and pierced it towards Lu Ming.
